name: Galley Slave
description: Your experience as a galley slave has given you some unique insight into the world of sailing and piracy.
prerequisites: Profession (sailor) 2 ranks, current or former galley slave
benefit: You get a +2 circumstance bonus on Profession (sailor) and Use Rope checks made while aboard a ship with oars and rowers. When fighting on a ship, your first hit each battle gets a +2 damage bonus.
